name: Workflow & Automation
description: Constitutional rules for browser automation, Playwright, and workflow engines (customized for saas-starter)
rules: CRITICAL: Implement proper error handling with retry logic
CRITICAL: Use proper wait strategies (not arbitrary sleeps)
HIGH: Use stable selectors (data-testid, role, label) over fragile CSS selectors
HIGH: Add timeout configuration for all operations
HIGH: Implement graceful degradation for failed automation steps
HIGH: Clean up resources (close browsers, delete temp files) after execution
MEDIUM: Add logging and tracing for debugging failed workflows
MEDIUM: Use page object model pattern for maintainable automation code
MEDIUM: Implement retry mechanism for transient failures
MEDIUM: Add screenshots or videos for failed automation runs
antiPatterns: Using sleep() instead of proper wait conditions
Fragile CSS selectors that break on UI changes

guidelines.selectors: Prefer data-testid > role > label > CSS selectors
guidelines.waits: Use waitForSelector, waitForNavigation, not arbitrary sleeps
guidelines.errorHandling: Capture screenshots and logs on failure for debugging
